welcomeBanner.subtitle: I code things while drinking coffee
welcomeBanner.content: My name is Pedro FÃ©lix and I do keyboard wizardry

aboutBanner.title: Tell me about yourself...
aboutBanner.description1: I'm an aspiring junior developer with a deep passion for coding and a will to build impactful software.
aboutBanner.description2: I'm eager to apply my skills, focusing in JavaScript and Python but I thrive to continuously learn from my experiences. My goal is to contribute with clean and effective code and grow into a skilled developer.
aboutBanner.description3: Contact Me! I'm always open to talk about new opportunities.

jobEntry1.description: Progressed from intern to a full-time position, assuming full responsibility and control over the geospatial data visualization project. Developed and maintained web solutions for the representation and analysis of geographic data. Participated in the development of a satellite simulator, contributing to the simulation of complex systems and the success of future launches.

jobEntry2.description: Development of web solutions for the visualization and analysis of geospatial data. Manipulation and processing of geographic data for integration into online platforms. Design conception and implementation of interactive interfaces for maps and orbital movement visualizations.

jobEntry3.description: Bachelor's degree in Information and Multimedia Technologies with a specialization in web programming, systems management, data analysis, and artificial intelligence. Experience in the creation and development of websites, AI models for automotive purposes, and database administration.
